state_variables._REQUIREMENT_hasVoted: MUST create: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => bool)) hasVoted - Per-proposal vote status tracking
state_variables._REQUIREMENT_voteWeights: MUST create: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => uint256)) voteWeights - Per-proposal vote weights

functions.vote: Vote casting - MUST: 1) Use getVotes() for token balance (not parameter), 2) Use per-proposal hasVoted mapping, 3) Check and auto-execute if majority reached
functions.executeProposal: Proposal execution - MUST be called automatically in vote() when majority reached, NOT as separate manual function
functions._REQUIREMENT_autoExecute: MUST check if majority reached at END of vote() function and call execute function automatically

security_summary:
Contract Type: Governor
Classification Confidence: 95%
Access Control: role_based
Security Features: Standard
Based on: OpenZeppelin Governor

Reasoning: The contract describes a DAO governance system where token holders can submit proposals and vote on them. It includes features like proposal submission, voting, result calculation, and automatic execution of approved actions, which align with the Governor template.
